description: This is a Dart source file for a Flutter application implementing a simple notes app. It includes models, service classes for interacting with a backend via Supabase, and several UI screens for listing, viewing, editing, and creating notes.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data model representing a single note with id, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt, and methods to convert from and to map structure for database interactions.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Service class providing CRUD operations interfacing with Supabase backend for notes management.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes from the database, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: fetchNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with specified title and content.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, initializes Supabase, and runs the app.
